title: Share of households with Netflix in the U.S. 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of TV households. In total the number of data points it has is 2.
Overall Share of TV households has increased over the Year.
Share of TV households is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2017.
Maximum Share of TV households, about 54.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Share of TV households about 28.0 was reached at Year 2011
